profile:
The best inspections are performed by passionate inspectors.   Buying or maintaining a home or condo can be intimidating. Get the professional guidance you need.

** Flexible workdays help accommodate your schedule.

** Extensive knowledge informs your inspection.

** Exceptional reporting aids your understanding.

** Transparent pricing assures you our best deal.

A genuine concern for your well-being and years of hands-on experience in construction, residential and commercial project management as well as extensive inspection training influence each inspection performed for you. 

Home Inspection | Condo Inspection | Town Home Inspection

profile:
Inspector David Fairbairn is a Vancouver building expert, and has been featured on Global TV News and in the 24 Newspaper. He brings a passion for a "job well done" to every inspection and works hard for you - the customer!
 
SEVEN GREAT REASONS TO USE US:
 
1) Inspections Done Right – You get an unconditional money-back guarantee on your inspections.
 
2) No Waiting – You will receive your digital inspection report the same day as the inspection – guaranteed.
 
3) Peace of Mind – You get a fully Bonded, Licensed and Insured company.
 
4) Quality Inspection Reports - No “checklists” – You get a 220-point, full-color report with photographs, to ensure an easy-to-read, but thorough understanding of the issues and features of your home.
 
5) Uncover Problems before they Show – We use only the latest tools and technology – Moisture Reading and IR Thermal Imaging available (optional)
 
6) FREE Home Maintenance Book - “Now That You’ve Had a Home Inspection”, featuring tips, tricks and maintenance info on your new home. Included with every inspection.
 
7) Service for Life – You get personal support, 24/7 after the inspection.
 
CALL TODAY FOR A QUOTE! - 604 395-2795

profile:
Founded in 2006 by Arne Larsen, West Coast Home Inspections has performed more than 1,500 professional inspections throughout the lower mainland.

*****

Professionally trained as a residential & commercial inspector with over a decade of inspection experience, with a 25 year 'hands-on' background in both residential and commercial construction, Arne is able to not only skilfully discover potential deficiencies within a home, he is able to convey them to you in a thoroughly detailed yet easy to understand inspection report.

*****

Providing Residential and Commercial Inspections, West Coast Home Inspections takes great pride in providing superior customer service - before, during and after the inspection.

****

Arne is fully Accredited by the Home Inspectors Association of British Columbia (HIABC), Licensed by Consumer Protection BC (#48042), is an A+ member of the BBB, and is fully insured.
specialities: Houses, Townhomes, Modular Homes, Mobile Homes, Tiny Homes, Condo's, Commercial Buildings

profile: At HightecH the client always comes first. Buying a home is the largest investment that most people make, and we are here to make sure that you have all of the information that you need to make an intelligent and fully informed purchase decision. We don’t rush you, and we answer all of your questions with no on site time limit. Serving the lower mainland since 1973.
